A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like it more than I dislike it. Felt pretty disappointed and not completely satisfied. Very good and interesting scenes with Rey\, Luke\, Kylo and Snoke\, but unfortunately also some uninteresting scenes with Finn and Rose. This film leaves me not looking forward to IX as much as I'd have wanted it to since the plot could have taken a very interesting\, refreshing\, new turn but the film decided against it and so we're (probably\, who knows?) left with the same story for IX as in the previous films. But... liked it.
